div.font: Willow Oak Montessori Charter School is a tuition-free public charter school serving students in grades K through 8. Located in Northeast Chatham County, we admit students from anywhere in North Carolina using an admissions lottery. See our News and Updates below to learn more about our new campus, coming this 2020-21!

div.span: Please click the link below to find the results of the March 2nd, 2020 Lottery drawing for grades K-8. As a spot opens, you will be contacted via phone and email in order of the waitlist. Note that this document contains the static results from the Lottery on March 2nd and will not be updated.

div.div: We are hiring! Find information about current opportunities on the Careers page.

span.font: WOM has had many plans and fundraisers since we opened in 2013 to be able to build a new campus, and we are delighted to share that our building project is underway!

div.font: For the 2020-21 school year both the Charter School & Children's House will be located @ 1476 Andrews Store Rd., Pittsboro NC. Please click back to the home page donate to our fundraising efforts.
